```{r}
# function to rotate 3d array in 90 degrees jumps
rot90.3d <- function(z, n) {
    p <- dim(z)[3]
    if (n%%2 == 0) out <- array(0, dim=dim(z))
    else out <- array(0, dim = c(dim(z)[2], dim(z)[1], dim(z)[3]))
    
    for (k in 1:p) {
        mx <- z[,,k]
        out[,,k] <- pracma::rot90(mx, n)
    }
    out
}
a <- array(1:18, dim = c(3,3,2))
a
```
```{r}
rot90.3d(a, 1)
```

```{r}
rot90.3d(a, 2)
```

```{r}
rot90.3d(a, 3)
```


```{r}
rot90.3d(a, 4)
```
